messages.content: make a simple flower file which displays a red flower in the cli. dont use emojis

A file named flower.py has been created. It displays a simple ASCII art flower in red color in the CLI, without using any emojis.

You can run it using:
```bash
python flower.py
```
Let me know if you'd like to see the output or make any changes!

Here is the output of the flower.py script—a simple red ASCII art flower displayed in the CLI. The red color is achieved using ANSI escape codes, and no emojis are used.

If you want to adjust the design or color, just let me know!
